message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll be interested in. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of offering $100 for it. Can you consider that?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can do $110, but I was thinking more along the lines of $115. Can you meet me in the middle?
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $112. Can you consider that?
I appreciate your flexibility, Bob. I can see we're getting close to a deal. I'm willing to meet you at $112, but I need to make a bit more profit. Can you meet me at $115?
